ESP.TRADUIT: 请允许我介绍我自己。我是玛戈医生，愿意为您效劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to leave. Will you unlock the door, please?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要走了。请问能不能帮我开一下门？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, but I'm afraid I can't do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我恐怕我不能那么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My hospitality does require limits, thanks to the barbarous nature of the wasteland. I must detain you for several hours as a... precaution.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于这片废土的野蛮天性，我的好客是有限度的。我必须耽搁你几个小时，作为...预防措施。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, relax and help yourself to a hot meal. If you're still determined to leave after dining, just convey your request over the intercom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请别介意，放松点，您可以随意享用这里的美食。如果你吃完了还是执意要走，那时请再通过对讲机告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you doing this? Isn't it reckless to invite strangers in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么这么做？如此轻易地让陌生人进来不是太大意了么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm doing this because I have suffered the unforgiving trials of the waste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这么做是因为我已经遭遇过太多的不幸。我理解一个人在废土求生的困难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have felt terrible, crippling hunger that pushes a man beyond reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也曾经遭遇不幸，体会到那残酷的饥饿能如何把人逼至极限。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I discovered this shelter in one of my countless peregrinations, and in the course of time I've set out to create an oasis of philanthropy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在游历了数不尽的地方之后，我发现了这处避难地，然后花了很长时间在这里建立了一个慈善的绿洲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's very noble of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您真的很高尚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, stop it. You're too kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，别说了，你太客气了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, enjoy a hot meal. It's the least I can do. When you're ready to leave, just speak over the intercom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请享用这些美食吧。这就是我能尽的微薄之力。当你决定要走的时候，请通过对讲机告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a gracious host, but I must be going now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您是一位亲切的主人，但我现在必须得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been an exceedingly amicable guest, but I'm afraid I cannot meet your request. I have other plans, you see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您也是如此和善的一位客人，但我恐怕我不能满足您的要求。你看，我还有其他的安排。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me out of here, you fucking nutjob!
ESP.TRADUIT: 放我走，你个该死的神经病！

ESP.ORIGINAL: That type of churlish invective will get you nowhere, fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种无礼的谩骂会让你无处可逃，很快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell is going on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里究竟发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're in a cell in my bunker. I'm afraid this is the end of the line, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在被囚禁在我的地堡里。恐怕你的日子就要走到头了，我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a matter of survival, really. What can I say? The wasteland really brings out that "War of all against all" quality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是生存的法则，真的，我还能说什么呢？这片废土真正体现了那种“人人互相争斗”的品质。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't know who you're fucking with. I'm going to cut your goddamn heart out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你根本就不知道你惹了谁，我要把你的心脏挖出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh lively, very lively!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，活泼，非常活泼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get in some exercise, but please, don't strain yourself. It can alter the flavor of the meat, making it... unsavory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 做些运动，但请不要过度劳累。因为这样肉会变得不鲜嫩...就没什么味道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now just behave yourself a few minutes. I'll return shortly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你就好好表现几分钟，我很快就会回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a cannibal, aren't you? You've been luring people in and murdering them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是食人者，对吧？先把别人引诱到这里，然后杀掉他们！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you possess copacetic powers of observation. Yes, I'm a cannibal, and a long-lived one, thank you. I'm rather proud of that fact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有很强的洞察力。是的，我是个食人者，而且已经活了很长时间。谢谢你指出，我对这个事实也感到很自豪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't quite hear you. Lean in a little closer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听不太清你说什么，能否走近一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must be deaf! I suppose there's little danger... you're still half-sedated, not to mention unarmed. <He leans in> Very well, I was saying...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是不是聋了！我想没什么危险...你还处于半麻醉状态，而且手无寸铁。[他倾身向前] 好吧，我是说...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I think I'll keep my distance, thank you very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我认为还是要保持点距离，谢谢你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Assault Mago>
ESP.TRADUIT: <袭击玛戈>

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这他妈...？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get your hands off... I- I can't feel...
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你的手...拿开...我-我感觉不到...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Fava beans... burning...
ESP.TRADUIT: 蚕豆...在燃烧...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Break Mago's neck>
ESP.TRADUIT: [折断玛戈的脖子]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get your hands off me, you damn, dirty ape!
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你的手拿开，你这该死的，肮脏的猿猴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attempt to Choke Mago>
ESP.TRADUIT: [试图掐死玛戈]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别介意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fool. I'll be back shortly. Don't do anything stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 傻瓜。我马上就会回来，别做傻事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: No matter what happens, you'll get what's coming to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管将会发生，都你应得的。上帝会惩罚你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been capturing and eating preachy fools like you for decades. What makes you think you're any different?
ESP.TRADUIT: 几十年来，我一直在捕捉并吃掉像你这样爱说教的傻瓜。你凭什么认为你和他们不同呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take a look at Bob over there. He was a spirited lawman from town, hell-bent on finding his brother's murderer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看那边那个家伙，他叫鲍博。他本是个坚定的警官，一心要找到杀害他哥哥的凶手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few nights ago Bob bashed his head in against the floor, in order to avoid the fate of his brother and so many others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几天前的晚上，鲍博为了避免自己走向他兄弟和许多其他人一样的命运，用头撞地板自杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's the justice in that? By every indication Bob was an honest, brave soul, who died with pride. Yet, I'm still standing here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这时候正义又在哪呢？从各方面来看，鲍博是个有着诚实，勇敢灵魂的人，他带着骄傲死去。然而，我还好好的依旧站在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't talk to me about justice. In a few minutes you're going to be silent, meaningless fodder for my survival. There's your justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别跟我谈论什么狗屁正义。再过几分钟，你就会永远沉默下去，成为我生存下去的下脚料。那，才是你的正义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no chance I can talk you out of this, is there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没机会说服你，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid not. Don't worry - I'll be quick about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕不行。别担心，我会很快搞定的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go fuck yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去操你自己吧！

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Step into this cell and see what happens. I'll shove that cleaver up your ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走走进这个牢房，看看会发生什么。我要把那把刀塞进你屁眼里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to enjoy this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会好好享受的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mago [0400757D] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outstanding job. Come back when you're ready for work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得漂亮！等你准备好接下一单工作就回来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then get out there and smoke that bastard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就滚出去赶紧开工！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to see Mr. Idaho. It's extremely urgent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来见爱达荷先生，有急事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... okay, well, if you say so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...好吧，如果你这么说的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rowdy Dalton [0400AD3F] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, ey! No way, jackass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，诶！没门，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rowdy Dalton [0400AD3F] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me through or I'll crack your fucking skull open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我过去，不然我打爆你的头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, normally I wouldn't let you through, but, uh, since it's important, you can go through, I guess... uh, just this once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，一般情况下我不会让你过去，不过，既然这件事很重要，你可以通过...就这一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rowdy Dalton [0400AD3F] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to kill Tony Idaho.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这，是为了杀托尼·爱达荷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You what? Oh, you ain't leaving here alive, bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么？你别想活着离开这里，贱人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rowdy Dalton [0400AD3F] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a bounty on your head. I'm here to collect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人悬赏要你的人头，我是来收钱的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll bury you, cockroach!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要亲手埋了你，蟑螂！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tony Idaho [0400A843] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm always ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我随时都没问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, this next bounty has a fine payoff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，下一个悬赏目标的报酬相当好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Target is Tony Idaho, a young man who's shaking up the drug trade in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目标叫托尼·爱达荷，这个家伙现在搅乱了整个莫哈维的毒品贸易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's been able to put more dope on the market at cheaper rates than all his competitors, including the Khans, who are not too pleased.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的产品在市场上的售价遥远低于他的竞争对手，其中包括大汗帮。他们很不高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're definitely getting a reputation - the client asked for you by name. They want Tony to bite the dust, immediately. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在的名声已经相当大了 - 所以客户点名要你来办。他们希望托尼永远沉睡在沙子里，马上。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not ready just yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没准备好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back when you have your shit together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你的破事准备好了就快回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outstanding work. Take a break, kid. You've earned it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得漂亮，休息一下，小子。这是你应得的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还没。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then get out there and do the job!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那还呆在这干什么，快去干活！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A kidnapping cannibal, you say? Shit, that's a surprise. Most of the cannibals around here have been put out of business by the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个专门绑架的食人魔？操，还有这种事。按理说大部分这样的家伙早就被NCR赶出这一带了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, here's your reward. Excellent work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，给，这是你应得的报酬。干得好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then get the hell out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么快滚出去干活！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a filthy liar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个下流的骗子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Prove it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 证明给我看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [0400B653] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you, shitkicker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你丫的，土包子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make your move, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就快走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [0400B653] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. This next contract has some significant risks, but a hefty payday to match it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。不过下一个合同就有点风险了，当然赏金也是很丰盛的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your target is a gunslinger known simply as "Jack". Our client hasn't given us much to work with, but it doesn't matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的目标是一个持枪歹徒，据称他叫“杰克”。我们的客户没有给我们其他什么信息，不过只要前面那点就足够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jack used to be the chief gunman for Heck Gunderson, and managed the muscle in Gunderson's operations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰克以前是赫克·冈德森的首席枪手，负责管理公司的“执行”部门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I said he managed the muscle, I mean he pretty much was the muscle. Jack intimidated countless landowners into selling their property.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说他参与管理，其实他正是执行者。杰克恐吓了大量的土地所有者，并逼迫他们低价出售自己的土地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Along the way, Jack managed to rack up a significant body count. Over the years he became more and more ruthless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一路走下来，在杰克身后躺下的尸体越来越多。慢慢的，他变得越来越残忍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Recently, Jack shot up a farmer and his wife, so Mr. Gunderson quickly cut all ties with his pistolero. Now, Jack is just another gun for hire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近，杰克枪杀了一对农场主夫妇。冈德森先生迅速解雇了他，和他撇清了一切关系。现在，杰克就只是个无所事事的老枪手了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without Gunderson to protect him, though, Jack is fair game. He's made plenty of enemies, and they all want to see him dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有冈德森先生保护他，杰克就好对付多了。他树立了太多的敌人，每一个都希望他死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last I heard he had drifted into Goodsprings, hoping to get work with the locals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我所听到最后的消息是，他流落到了清泉镇，希望从当地人那里找到一份工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jack is as fast as they come, so be ready, kid. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰克是个很出色的快枪手。所以好好准备吧，祝你好运，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then quit wasting my time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就别再浪费我的时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a little surprised to see you unscathed. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很惊讶你竟然毫发未损。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then get out there and do your damn job!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么快滚出去，把你的任务搞定再回来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, here's the story. The Westside Militia has lost some personnel to a marauding Fiend ringleader named Kurt Katil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，故事是这样的。西区民兵因为一个叫科特·卡迪尔的恶魔帮小头目损失了不少士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He and his crew have been ambushing patrols and periodically taking captives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和他的部下经常埋伏巡逻队，并时不时地绑架俘虏士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reports indicate his favorite torture is gnawing on the intestines of living captives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 报告显示，他最喜欢的酷刑是啃食活着的俘虏的肠子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Needless to say, he's a sick fuck. Bag this asshole and head back, okay? Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问，他是个变态。把他干掉，好吧？祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't come back until you're ready to work, dammit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你准备好工作之前别回来，该死！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, your target is Tommy, a hotheaded wiseguy associated with the Omertas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，你的目标叫汤米，是黑手党的一名成员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tommy was always quick to throw down, but the other night he got worked up after some guy cracked a joke about his shoes. Can you imagine?
ESP.TRADUIT: 汤米之前不太惹事。但某天晚上他听到有人嘲笑他的鞋子，他就生气了。你能想的出来吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, Tommy whipped out his pistol and capped this fella, right there outside the casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，汤米掏出手枪，把那家伙干掉了，就在赌场外面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: As it turns out, this guy was sort of... connected, so to speak. In short, Tommy fucked up, and now he's gotta pay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实证明，这家伙有点...关系，是有联系的。简而言之，汤米搞砸了，现在他要付出代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My contact says that Tommy is probably hiding out at the old Tumbleweed Ranch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的线人说汤米可能就藏在风滚草牧场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say he's jumpy as shit and prone to shoot anything that comes through the door, so be careful. Good luck, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说他现在很神经质，会攻击一切靠近门的东西。小心点，孩子，祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The contract is waiting, kid. Don't take too long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的客户在等着呢，孩子，别花太长时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terrific work, kid. Here's a bonus. Come back when you're ready for more work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很棒的工作，孩子，这是额外的奖金。当你准备好做更多的工作时再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop standing around this dump and go bag that goon!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就别在这傻站着，快去干活！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're beginning to bore the hell out of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你开始让我感到厌烦了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I'll let my sword do the talking, worm!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就让我的剑来说话吧，可怜虫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucius Pullo [0400C745] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the hell are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm First Spear Centurion Lucius Pullo, friend to the late Vulpes Inculta.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吾乃凯撒军团第一长矛团百夫长，卢修斯·普罗，已故沃尔普斯·因库塔之友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucius Pullo [0400C745] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You slew my friend without cause, and I am here for justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你无缘无故地杀了我的朋友，我是来伸张正义的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucius Pullo [0400C745] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stipendium peccati mors est. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 罪恶的回报是死亡。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mors tua, vita mea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你死，我活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lucius Pullo [0400C745] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someway, somehow, a collection of bums, junkies and lowlifes managed to scrape together 500 caps for this next bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，不知怎的，拾荒者，吸毒者和下层民众设法凑了500瓶盖作为下个任务对象的赏金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bounty is on some rich kid named Alex. From time to time little Alex enjoys terrorizing the less fortunate members of Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个悬赏的对象是一个叫艾利克斯的有钱小鬼。这家伙对恐吓自由之城的贫民乐在其中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: This seems like a waste of time, but business is business, and they've already shelled out the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来似乎浪费时间，但生意就是生意，客户已经把钱都寄过来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their head honcho is some bum named Jasper. You can find him at Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 客户的头叫杰斯帕，一个无所事事的混混。你可以在自由之城找到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. Take your sweet-ass time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，去享受你的女孩儿时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not picky about where the caps come from. Consider it done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从不挑剔瓶盖是从哪里来的，包在我身上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever the professional, eh? Just bring back the finger, same as usual.
ESP.TRADUIT: 越来越职业了么，嗯？像以前一样，把手指带回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're probably desperate. Give them back the caps - I'll do it for free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里的人生活在水深火热之中。把这些瓶盖还给客户，我不要一分钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, it's your money. Just don't go soft on me, kid. It's bad for your health in this profession. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，这是你的钱，别跟我说这些恶心人的话，孩子。干这行你自己的身体最重要。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 发生什么事了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alex and his boys... they heard me and Ben got the money together... and so they kicked the shit out of me and dragged him into the alley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 艾利克斯和他那帮人...他们听说我和本凑齐了钱...所以他们把我揍得屁滚尿流，把他拖到了巷子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jasper [0400CA4C] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ben never hurt nobody... but I reckon they killed him. That's what they do sometimes, just for a laugh, those sonsabitches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 本从没伤害过任何人...但我担心他们会把他杀了。他们有时的确会这么干的，而仅仅是为了取乐，这帮混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jasper [0400CA4C] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to give them exactly what they've been dishing out. I'll cut Alex's head off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要让他们尝尝他们自己种下的恶果。看我怎么砍掉艾利克斯的头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, you're not fucking around, are you? I was kinda doubtful, but you're going to kill those assholes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 靠，你不是这一带的人吧你？我很怀疑你的话，但你真的要去干掉那帮家伙？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jasper [0400CA4C] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad you're here, but either way I'm not sticking around. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴你来了，但不管怎样我都不会留下来了。祝你好运吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jasper [0400CA4C] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down, I'm going to find your friend and deal with Alex.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静点，我一定帮你找到你的朋友，然后解决艾利克斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sure hope so, otherwise I'm a dead man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然也这样希望，否则我早就死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jasper [0400CA4C] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm getting the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一定要离开这个鬼地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jasper [0400CA4C] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You brought sticks to a gunfight?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你带着棍子去枪战？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gunfights be damned! Come and get one in the yarbles, if you have any yarbles!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的枪战！有种来陪我们玩玩，如果你有卵蛋的话！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex [0400CA5F] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eat shit and die, you sick fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吃屎，去死，你个混球玩意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Naughty, naughty, naughty!
ESP.TRADUIT: 粗鲁，粗鲁，太粗鲁了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex [0400CA5F] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you capture helpless bums and eat them? What the fuck is wrong with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你抓无助的流浪汉然后吃了他们？你他妈有什么毛病?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could never stand to see a filthy, dirty old drunkie, howling away at the filthy songs of his fathers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没法忍受这样一个恶心的、肮脏的老酒鬼，一路嚎叫着唱歌歌颂着他的死老头子们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex [0400CA5F] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good work. You're bringing us a lot of business, so here's a bonus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不错。你给我们带来了大量的生意。这是你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what the fuck are you waiting for? Go kill him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那你还站在这干什么？去干掉他啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, here's the story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我来给你讲讲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chuck Bowdrie, a senior NCR Ranger, recently defected to Caesar's Legion. Before jumping ship, he killed two fellow rangers while on patrol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恰克·博迪莱，前NCR高级游骑兵，近期背叛并加入凯撒军团。在彻底跳船前，他枪杀了两名巡逻中的游骑兵兄弟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our client wants this guy terminated with extreme prejudice. We don't have many leads, but he's said to be on the run up north.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的客户希望他被处以极刑。我们没有太多的线索，不过据说他正往北方逃窜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I happen to know that several rangers in Bowdrie's old troop used to crash at Field's shack, close to Nellis. You might try there. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我碰巧听说，几个来自博迪莱老部队的游骑兵经常在一处田间小屋夜宿，那个地方靠近内利斯空军基地，你或许可以从那儿入手。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then why are you wasting my time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那为什么你还在浪费我时间？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Here's a reward, whether you want it or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，这是报酬，不管你想不想要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm getting some very interesting contracts. Come back when you're ready to pursue them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在又得到了几份很有趣的合同。想继续的话随时欢迎到我这儿来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then get your ass to Freeside and kill that fucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你赶紧去自由之城干掉那个王八蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. I must admit - I harbor an acute loathing for traitors of any sort, so here's a bonus on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。我必须承认 - 我对任何类型的叛徒都深恶痛绝，所以我要给你额外奖金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then get your ass out there and smoke that perfidious piece of shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你还在这干什么？赶紧滚出去干活！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, the target is Billy Bogan, a recently escaped convict from the NCR Correctional Facility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这次的目标是比利·博根，一个最近刚从NCR监狱里跑掉的罪犯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was on death row for the murder of an NCR ranger, Captain Gunn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他要为一起谋杀负责，谋杀的受害者是一名NCR游骑兵，甘恩上尉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Young Billy was headed for the gallows, but now he's running free, much to the chagrin of the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 年轻的比利本要接受绞刑，但他现在跑了，NCR为此懊恼不已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seeing as to how they're stretched thin, the NCR's relying on you to see that Billy doesn't escape justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于这群家伙笨的连点线索都找不到，NCR现在指望你来实现对比利的惩罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our informant said that Billy's formed a new gang composed of ex-cons, raiders and various misfits, and apparently they're armed to the teeth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我们的情报，比利现在组织了一个由有犯罪前科的人、掠夺者、强奸犯和其他杂七杂八的人等构成的团伙。显然，他们武装到了牙齿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Billy and his gang are headed north, likely to raid in lawless regions. I'm betting they're camped outside the northern passage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比利和他的帮派之后向北进发，可能在一些法律触及不到的地区大肆抢劫。我打赌，他们现在应该在北方的某个地方驻扎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get up there and bag that punk. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去找到他然后把他收拾了。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then leave, dammit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就去干活，可恶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're kicking ass out there, kid. At this rate I'm going to be out of contracts soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你太厉害了，孩子。你再这么快，我这边就快没合同了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But don't worry, there's plenty of work left. Come back when you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过别担心，我开玩笑的，还有很多工作等着你去做，等你准备好了就回来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm running out of patience. Go kill that murdering bastard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我快没耐心了。快去把那个混蛋干掉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've done a great job here, Sheriff, but your services are needed elsewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里做得很好，警长，但其他地方也需要你的服务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, thank you. You know, I have made quite a difference here. There's plenty of other towns that need regulating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么，谢谢你，你知道，我给这里已经带来了巨大的变化。当然，外面还有很多小镇需要督管。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0400EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not going to work on me, runt. Regulators don't respond to threats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种话对我没用，矮子。监管者不会害怕威胁的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0400EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here on behalf of Westside's citizens. Leave right now or I'll break your fucking neck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我代表西区的市民站在这里。现在就给我滚，否则我拧断你的脖子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, uh...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，呃...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0400EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck em! If they want to live like fucking barbarians, without law and order, to hell with them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的！如果他们想像野蛮人一样地生活而无视法律和秩序的存在的话，那么就下地狱吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0400EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You couldn't break open a can of cat food, dickshit. Get out of my face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你连一罐猫食都打不开，蠢货。别再出现在我的视野里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0400EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get out of here, or I'll break... your collarbone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我滚出这里，不然我就...打断你的锁骨！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to leave town, right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在就给我从这儿滚蛋，马上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kiss my ass. I'm not going anywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲我的屁股吧。我哪也不去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0400EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to leave Westside right now, in a coffin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你马上给我从西区滚蛋，否则我就帮你买口棺材。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the fuck?
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞什么鬼？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dallas Courtright [0400EAF5] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Before we delve into the bounty, I'm going to give you a quick history lesson. Stop rolling your eyes, dammit - this relates to the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。在我们深入研究下一个赏金目标之前，我先给你上堂历史课。别翻白眼，臭小子，这和你接下来的任务有关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll assume you're unfamiliar with the Regulators. In the eastern U.S., Regulators are idealistic vigilantes, hell-bent on killing bad guys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你对“监管者”不是很熟悉。在美国东部，“监管者”类似理想主义的义务警员，拼命追杀坏蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, in the Core Region, Regulators are a very different breed. They're basically thugs who force businesses to pay protection money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但在中部地区，“监管者”却是完全不同的一类人。他们基本上就是强迫商家支付保护费的暴徒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're authoritarian gangsters, really. This relates to your bounty because the target is a western Regulator by the name of Dallas Courtright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们其实就是手里握有权力的专制黑帮，真的。这之所以和你的赏金有关，因为这次你的目标是一个叫做达拉斯·考特莱特的西部监管者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Recently, Dallas drifted into Westside and appointed himself Sheriff and de facto dictator. He's taxing commerce and breaking heads left and right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近，这个达拉斯来到西区，任命自己为治安官和事实上的独裁者。他对商业征税，四处打人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In light of this, a collection of concerned citizens has contracted us to "convince" Sheriff Courtright to leave, by any means necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对此，一些深感忧虑的市民们一起向我提供这样一份合同，希望能把他赶跑，越快越好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is an unusual contract in that you don't have to kill or capture the target. Just convince him that leaving is in his best interests.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一份不同寻常的合同，因为你不必把他杀掉或逮捕，你只需说服他“离开这里对他最有利”就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he's a stubborn ass and you have to let the lead do the talking, so be it. Just get him out of Westside. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他还是顽固不化，那么你想干什么就干什么吧。记住，只要让他离开西区就好。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then why are you here? What do you think we're in, the fuckin' haberdashery business?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你还打算继续在这站着？你以为我们是干什么的？好吃懒做就能赚钱了？？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you, hillbilly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你妈，混蛋乡巴佬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eat shit and die, murderer!
ESP.TRADUIT: 吃屎然后去死吧，杀人犯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luke McCaffery [0400EB0A] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I killed Caleb, but it was strictly business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我杀了凯莱布，但这只不过是生意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, then you're gonna enjoy the business end of my barrel!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，看来你是想自讨苦吃！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luke McCaffery [0400EB0A] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> I had nothing to do with your brother's death.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 我和你兄弟的死毫无关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... If you say so. I guess we made a mistake. We'll be on our way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...如果真是这样，那我误会你了。我们还是各走各的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luke McCaffery [0400EB0A] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard enough of your bullshit. It's payback time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听够了你的胡扯，现在该偿血债了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luke McCaffery [0400EB0A] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么会在这？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to give you an offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这给你个提议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0400EB28] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go fuck yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去操你自己吧！

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0400EB28] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do I stand to gain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能得到什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You stand to gain everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么都能得到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0400EB28] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who do you work for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为谁工作？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should have taken the offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该接受这个提议的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0400EB28] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you going to beg?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不打算乞求吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0400EB28] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not interested in the offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对你的提议毫无兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what has to happen, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你自己清楚接下来会发什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0400EB28] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have to do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没必要这么做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: People always say the same thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们总是说相同的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0400EB28] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say, "You don't have to do this."
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说：“你没必要这么做。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0400EB28] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should admit your situation. There will be more... dignity in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你该明白你当前的形势，你自己想想怎么做才能更有...尊严。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0400EB28] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you do this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a living.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0400EB28] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dyin' ain't much of a living, boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等死可不是我的作风，孩子。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0400EB28] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to Randall?
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰道尔怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I buried him in the desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他已经被我埋在沙漠里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Javier Sugar [0400EB28] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough discussion. I'm here to kill you, fat man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 讨论到此为止。我来是杀你的，死胖子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not original, but succinct.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不新颖，但简洁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Titles are ultimately a trivial matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫什么是一件微不足道的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I can do, however, is more important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 重要的是，我能做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you kill Randall?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要杀兰道尔？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's only natural to eliminate the competition, and that takes on a literal quality in these times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 淘汰竞争对手，再自然不过了。而且在这个时代，这能更符合字面意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Historical law always subverts moral law.
ESP.TRADUIT: 历史规律总是颠覆道德法则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what can you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你能怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I represent an organization of like-minded individuals. We're beginning to assert ourselves across the carcass of North America.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我代表一个由志同道合的人组成的组织，我们开始在北美的废墟上展现自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In time... we'll be in a position to establish control on a regional level.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迟早...我们会彻底控制整个地区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've proven yourself capable, and despite your obdurate nature, I'm willing to extend an offer to join the organization. This is your only chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经证明了自己的能力，尽管你生性固执，我还是愿意为你提供加入组织的机会。这是你唯一的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're nothing more than a low murderer. I want no part of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是个低劣的杀人犯，我不想掺和进来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a shame. Such a waste...
ESP.TRADUIT: 太遗憾了，太浪费了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it, some kind of post-apocalyptic Illuminati? Who's in your little club?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么东西，某种后启示录光明会？都是些什么人聚集在你这个小俱乐部？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Names you've never heard, from places you've never visited. Littlehorn, for example.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从未听说过的名字，来自你从未去过的地方。比如，小号角。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although I think there is someone you have heard of... Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我想应该还是有一个名字你听过...马尔科。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: The less you know, the better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的越少，就越好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In fact, your relentless inquiries have taxed my patience. It's time for a decision
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，你没完没了的询问已经耗尽了我的耐心。是时候做出决定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说马尔科。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's just a man - the most human sort, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他只是一个人 - 最普通的那种，真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe he's a... balancing force. Man is predatory by nature, and Marko exemplifies those qualities.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信他就是一种平衡力的体现。人类天生就具有掠夺性，马尔科就是这些品质的典型。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko represents homo sapiens in its purest form.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科代表了最纯粹的智人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's on an endless journey, sowing strife at every opportunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他正在他那无尽的旅途中，抓住每一个机会散播罪恶与争斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: With that said, I heard rumors he was marauding through the Llano Estacado, but it's only speculation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说我一些小道传闻，说他在埃斯塔卡多平原抢劫，但没有人亲眼见到过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko is just one man. I'm sensing that you're apathetic about my offer. Understand there's no turning back now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科只是一个人。我感觉你对我的提议不感兴趣，你要明白，现在已经没有回头路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sending you to hell, right now. Then I'm going to send Marko to keep you company.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在就送你下地狱。然后我会送马尔科来陪你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're still ruled by fear, aren't you? Fool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还是被恐惧支配着，对吧？傻子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's in it for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能从中得到什么好处？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides walking out of this bunker alive?
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了能活着走出这个地堡吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you enter our ranks, I can guarantee a signing bonus to the tune of... 50,000 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你加入，我可以保证给你一笔签约奖金...50000瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what's your decision?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么样？你的决定是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll join the organization. What do I have to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要加入这个组织。我需要做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, I'd like to commend you for making the sapient choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，我要赞扬你做出了明智的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll seal this deal the old-fashioned way - with a handshake. Just come around the desk and greet me when you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其次，我们以一种传统的方式 - 握手，来缔结我们的契约。等你准备好了，就到桌子前来跟我握手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Shake the Judge's hand>
ESP.TRADUIT: [和审判官握手]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I think you'll find the arrangement... agreeable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，我想你会很快发现这样的安排...是令人非常惬意的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> I can't quite hear you Judge, can you lean in closer?
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 我听不太清楚，审判官，你能近点吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you suddenly gone deaf? Alright, now what's your decision?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你突然聋了吗？好了，现在你的决定是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you're quite close enough. Are you going to commit or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你离已经够近了。你到底是加还是不加入？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> No, I swear I can't hear you. Please lean in closer.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 不，我发誓我听不到你。请再近点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A young person like you shouldn't be hard of hearing! Alright, I know you can hear me now - what is your decision?
ESP.TRADUIT: 像你这个年龄的年轻人怎么会听不到声音？好吧，现在应该可以听见了吧 - 你的决定是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you're quite close enough. Are you going to commit or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你离得已经够近了。你到底要不要入伙？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Rip out the Judge's throat with your bare teeth>
ESP.TRADUIT: [用裸露的牙齿撕咬审判官的喉咙]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get away from me, you maniac! My neck...
ESP.TRADUIT: 离我远点，你个疯子！我的脖子...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Use a strength-based attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: <尽全力一击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You bastard! Slaves... fucking useless...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你个杂种！我的奴隶呢...真他妈没用...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: M-Marko... b-brother... find...
ESP.TRADUIT: 马-马尔科...兄-兄弟...找...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Break the Judge's neck>
ESP.TRADUIT: [扭断审判官的脖子]

ESP.ORIGINAL: <He easily escapes your grasp> Get your hands off me!
ESP.TRADUIT: <他轻易摆脱了你的掌控>把你的手拿开！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll pay for this treachery!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要为你的背叛付出代价！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Choke the Judge>
ESP.TRADUIT: [掐死审判官]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about somebody called "The Judge"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知不知道一个叫“审判官”的人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yea, I know about him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我知道他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a fucking butcher and a pederass. Some people don't believe he exists, but he's quite real.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就是个屠夫，是个恋童癖。有些人不相信有这么个家伙，但他的确是存在的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's close to seven feet tall and stronger than any man alive. I saw him rip a man's jawbone out and bludgeon him to death with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他大概7英尺高，比任何活着的人都强壮。我曾看见他扯出一个人的下颚骨，用它把他打死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like to admit it, but I worked with him on one job - it was the worst mistake I made in the course of my career.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想承认，但我以前和他一起工作过 - 这或许是我职业生涯中犯的最严重的错误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm no stranger to killin', but that maniac actually enjoyed it. We were supposed to acquire a man who had fled the NCR, but things went wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对杀人并不陌生，但那个疯子却乐在其中。有一次，我们本应该捉住一个NCR逃兵，但后来出了岔子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was watching the door when the Judge went inside to haul the target out, since we were supposed to get him alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 审判官进去把目标拖出来的时候我正盯着门，因为我们要活捉他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon after, I hear the shotgun go off and a kid screaming bloody murder, so I run inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没过多久，我听到霰弹枪响了，一个孩子尖叫着“杀人了”，所以我跑了进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was blood everywhere... he had shot the man and then scalped him before I could blink. He was just standing there, grinning...
ESP.TRADUIT: 到处都是血...他把那个男人崩了，在我还没来得及眨眼之前，把他的头皮也割了下来。他就站在那里，龇牙咧嘴地笑着...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He turned and grabbed the target's child, a little red-headed boy. That's when I shot him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他转身抓住了目标的孩子，一个红头发的小男孩。就在那时我朝他开了枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I shouldn't say anymore. Are you ready to work or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不该说这么多的。你准备好开始干活了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's bad mojo, kid. You don't want any part of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个坏兆头，孩子。你肯定不想参合进来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't leave me hanging! What happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能把我晾在一边！发生了什么事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I regret that I only wounded him. He never forgot, either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很后悔我只是打伤了他。他也从未忘记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I saw him standing over that boy, knife in hand... I saw what I might have become... a fucking monster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我看到他站在那里抓着孩子，另一只手里的刀慢慢提起...我看到了我自己可能会变成的样子...一个该死的怪物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: At that point I decided to start my own firm, even if it meant risking my neck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那时起我决定开一家自己的公司，即使这意味着要冒生命危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Judge had his own plans, of course. He started up Richter & Associates, where he's the primary shot-caller.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，审判官有他自己的计划。他创立了里克特同盟会，他是那里主要的幕后操纵人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: From what I hear, he might be moving to Vegas. If that's true, things are likely to get a lot bloodier here in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就我的情报表明，他要搬来维加斯了。如果那是真的，那么莫哈维很有可能要掀起一场腥风血雨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dammit, you got me distracted! Are you ready to work or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 可恶，你从我这儿套出太多的故事了！你准备好开始干活了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mentioned you were from Mississippi, right? What's it like there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提到过你来自密西西比，对吧？那里怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's hot and humid as fuck, and the mosquitoes will literally eat your ass alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里又热又潮湿，成群的蚊子喜欢优雅地叮你屁股。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I grew up on a farm, herding Brahmin and other livestock. Some of the places are still irradiated, but it's mostly cleared up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在一个农场长大，放牧婆罗门和其他牲畜。农场里有些地方仍然受到辐射，但大部分已经清理干净了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Gulf's a rough region, but people get by. It would take an act of God to tame that place - I doubt even Caesar and his crazies could manage it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 美湾地区的情况不太好，但人们还能凑合。要驯服那个地方只能靠上帝的力量了 - 我怀疑即使是凯撒和他的疯子们也无法做到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, quit distracting me! Are you ready to work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，别再套我话了！你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do I have to collect fingers? Can't I bring back their head or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么非要我收集手指？我不能把他们的头带回来吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you, some kind of psychopath?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么神经病吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, we collect fingers because it's a quick and efficient way to provide proof of death. I'm not building some crazy finger necklace or anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，收集手指是因为这是最快速甚至最有效的证明死亡的方法。我不是在做什么疯狂的手指项链之类的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I learned it from a man I encountered in my younger days. He found me after Marko had cut me to shreds, since he was on that bastard's trail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我从我年轻的时候碰到的一个人那里学到的。他是在马尔科把我撕碎后找到我的，因为他一直在追踪那个杂种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: His name was Marshal Cooper, and he was the bravest lawman and bounty hunter I ever encountered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的名字叫马歇尔·库珀，他是我见过的最勇敢的执法者和赏金猎人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw him kill three raiders single-handedly - with a fucking fork! I wouldn't believe that shit if I hadn't watched him do it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾亲眼见到，他只用单手加一个叉子就干掉了三个掠夺者！天，如果不是我亲眼见到，打死我也不相信这种事！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know much about him, except he came from Virginia or Maryland somewhere. He was some kind of high-ranking Regulator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对他了解不多，只知道他来自弗吉尼亚州或马里兰州的某个地方。另外他好像是某种高级监管者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, he saved my life several times, and he taught me everything I know. We parted ways years ago - he had unfinished business back East.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说，他救了我好几次，他教会了我所知道的一切。几年前，我们分开了，他在东部还有未竟的事业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: After that, I came out west, looking to join up with the first crew that would hire me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之后，我来到西部，希望加入第一个愿意雇用我的团队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, that's enough of fucking storytime with Uncle Steven - are you ready to work or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，与斯蒂文叔叔的他妈的故事时间到此结束，你准备好开始工作了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the most dangerous bounty you ever pursued?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你曾经参与过的最危险的任务是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The most dangerous? Hmmm... I'd have to think about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最危险的？嗯...让我想想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's tons of men that were plenty mean, and more than a few were just crazy. But dangerous? I'd have to go with Doc Friday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我经历过须要面对很多人的任务，经历过很多很疯狂的任务，但危险的么？我想谈谈关于“星期五”医生的那一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ol' Doc isn't your typical Doctor - I hear he was an orthodontist before the war, whatever the fuck that is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个医生不是你印象中典型的医生 - 我听说他在战前是一名牙齿矫正医生。操，管他是什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doc's a ghoul gunslinger, and I'm speaking about him in the present tense because he's almost certainly still alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个食尸鬼枪手。我用一般现在时语跟你描述他，是因为我觉得他现在肯定还活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Years ago a bounty came up on Doc because he had shot an actor in the testicles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几年前，有人悬赏缉拿他，原因是他开枪打爆了一个男演员的睾丸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never liked actors, so I decided to give Doc a chance and explain his side of the story. He was quite affable, despite being a ghoul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来就不喜欢演员，于是我给了他一个机会解释自己的行为。虽然他是一个食尸鬼，但他性格却十分和蔼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So many of them are self-pitying pissants, but Doc never whined - he just treated everyone with courtesy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们中的许多人都是牢骚满天，让人感到厌恶的混球，但这个医生从不发牢骚，他只是礼貌地对待身边的每一个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We talked it over, and he was so damned likable I agreed to settle his bounty on a game of cards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们谈了很长时间，他的个性是如此的令人喜欢。最后我同意以一局牌来解决那次赏金行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure enough, that slick bastard took me for everything, so I let him go. I'm glad I did, because later I heard about his reputation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果不言而喻，我输个精光，所以我让他走了。我很高兴我这么做了，因为之后他的名声越来越响。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Despite his polite nature, ol' Doc is the fastest goddamn pistol in the region, maybe in the whole fucking continent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了他礼貌的品行，他还是当地反应最快的枪手，哦，或者说整个大陆也说不定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard he once smoked an entire squad of legionaries that tried to arrest him for drug smuggling. He wiped them out in seconds, supposedly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说他一个人干翻了整整一队想要逮捕他走私毒品的军团士兵。他或许在几秒之内就把他们全部干掉了，我猜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He still drifts from here to there, always with that ghoul whore at his side. "No-face Kate" was her name, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他常常徘徊在不同的地区，但他的身边总是跟着一个食尸鬼妓女。“没脸的凯特”，这大概是她的名字吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you ever encounter him, I'd advise you to return his courtesy. Shit, I got distracted again! Are gonna work or not, dammit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能碰到他，我建议你对它礼貌相待。操，我又被你分心了！准不准备开始干活？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Earlier you described ghouls as "Zombies". You know that's offensive, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前你曾经管食尸鬼叫“僵尸”。你知道这是一种冒犯，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not offensive - someone putting a 12 gauge up your ass and pulling the trigger, now that's offensive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那才不是冒犯 - 有人拿着12口径的左轮把枪口塞进你的菊花然后扣动扳机，这才是冒犯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I once saw a zombie do that to one of my friends, so it left a strong impression.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经见一个僵尸对我的一个朋友那么做，所以这个情景给我留下了很深的印象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get me wrong, I've met some square ghouls like Doc Friday and, well... let me-let me think... I'm sure there are others. I'll get back to that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别误会，我也见过一些正直的食尸鬼，如“星期五”医生，和...我想想...我肯定还见过别的。我回头再谈这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, the incident I'm referencing happened over 10 years ago. Me and my partner, James, were tracking a bounty in New Mexico.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我提到的这件事发生在十多年前。我和我的搭档詹姆斯，在新墨西哥州追踪一个赏金目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were unfamiliar with the territory, and eventually some ghouls got the jump on us. I was wounded, and James was green, so it went bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们对那个地区不是很熟悉，最终一些食尸鬼把我们包围了。我受伤了，詹姆斯是新手，所以事情就变糟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were a collection of ghoul fanatics from some "reservation", and they took us captive after the firefight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是一群来自某个“保留地”的食尸鬼狂热分子，他们在交火后俘虏了我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their leader was a ghoul named Phillips. Ray Phillips, that's it. I think he had relatives back east.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的领袖是个叫菲利普斯的食尸鬼。雷·菲利普斯，就是这个名字。我猜他大概在东部有亲戚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, ol' Ray took special pride in making us "smoothskins" suffer. He said he would use the "five pains" method on us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，老雷对折磨我们这些滑皮特别骄傲。他说，他要用“五种痛苦”来折磨我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He started with James, cutting off his nose, his hand, and then a foot. Ray was going to cut him in half, but James called him a, "Zombie cunt".
ESP.TRADUIT: 他先从詹姆斯开始，切了他的鼻子，他的手，然后是他的脚。雷接着想把他切为两半，但这是詹姆斯突然大喊“僵尸贱逼！”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ray didn't appreciate the label, so he responded by shoving his shotgun into James and pulling the trigger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雷不喜欢这个绰号，于是他把一把霰弹枪从下面塞入了詹姆斯的体内，然后扣动了扳机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, how I got away is an interesting story, since... goddamnit, look at the time! I've got to finish this typing, and you've gotten me distracted!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我是怎么逃出来的是这段故事里最有趣的部分，因为...操，快看看现在几点了！我得把打字打完，你又让我分心了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you ready to work or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备开始新任务了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Perform an unarmed attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: <开始徒手搏击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you... Dammit, you broke my arm!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈在干...该死，你弄断了我的胳膊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Break the Judge's Arm>
ESP.TRADUIT: <打断审判官的胳膊>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... bastard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...杂种！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marko... will... find...
ESP.TRADUIT: 马尔科...会...找到...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Break the Judge's Neck>
ESP.TRADUIT: [折断审判官的脖子]

ESP.ORIGINAL: <He deftly dodges your punch> What the hell?
ESP.TRADUIT: <他巧妙地躲开了你的一拳>你他妈到底？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You perfidious worm! I'll eat your liver!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这背信弃义的虫子！我要吃了你的肝脏！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Sucker punch the Judge>
ESP.TRADUIT: <突如其来给审判官一拳>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not impressed. Do you really need armed slaves to face a simple courier?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不感兴趣。你真的需要那些奴隶来帮你对付我这么一个小邮差？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They've been useful... for a time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们...有时还是会有用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, I make a habit of recycling my property every 6 months, and I'm already tired of this crew.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我有一个习惯，每隔6个月就回收一次我的资产，现在这帮家伙我正好已经腻了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, it's time for a new set of toys. But first, I'm going to relish killing you by myself!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，是时候换换新玩具了。但首先，我要尝尝亲自杀死你的滋味！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You, a simple courier? Ha! I've seen what you can do. I want your decision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你？普通的小邮差？哈！我知道你能做些什么，我需要你做决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Taunt] I thought this would be a challenge. All I see is a fuckin' freak and his slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: [嘲弄] 我把这当成一个挑战。我所能看到的，只有一个该死的怪胎和他愚蠢的奴隶。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Judge [0400FADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then get out there and do your damn job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就滚去完成你那该死的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [04000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([04000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: New Vegas Bounties
ESP.TRADUIT: 新维加斯赏金行动

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Tom Quigley and retrieve his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死汤姆·奎格雷，取得他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Randall and collect your reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找兰道尔领取你的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak to Chesty about the recent Caravan attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和切斯蒂交谈，讨论最近发生的商队遇袭事件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Randall with Onoda's finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着奥诺达的手指回去找兰道尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Eileen and retrieve her finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死艾琳，取得她的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Randall with Eileen's finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着艾琳的手指回去找兰道尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Cullen and retrieve his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死卡伦，取得他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Randall with Cullen's finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着卡伦的手指回去找兰道尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Randall about the bounty hunter position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟兰德尔聊聊赏金猎人的职位。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the attacker's corpse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查袭击者的尸体。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find Onoda, kill him, and retrieve his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到奥诺达，杀死他，取得他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Tony Idaho and retrieve his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死托尼·爱达荷，取得他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Randall with Tony's finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着托尼的手指回去找兰道尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Tommy and retrieve his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死汤米，取得他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Randall with Tommy's finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着汤米的手指返回兰道尔处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak to Jasper about the beatings in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与杰斯帕交谈，讨论在自由之城的杀人事件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find out Ben's fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确认本的命运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Alex and retrieve his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死艾利克斯，取得他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Randall with Alex's finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着艾利克斯的手指回去找兰道尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Ricky about the child abductions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟里基聊聊关于小孩绑架事件的线索。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the cave outside of town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查小镇外的一处洞穴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Fred and retrieve his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀了弗瑞德和食尸鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Randall with Fred's finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着弗瑞德的手指回去找兰道尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the disappearances
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查失踪事件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the shelter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查藏身处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Mago and retrieve his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死玛戈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Randall with Mago's finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着玛戈的手指回去找兰道尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Retrieve your gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 取回你的装备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Jack and retrieve his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死杰克，取得他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Randall with Jack's finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着杰克的手指回去找兰道尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Kurt Katil and retrieve his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀了科特·卡迪尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Randall with Kurt's finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着科特·卡迪尔的手指回去找兰道尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Chuck Bowdrie and retrieve his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死恰克·博迪莱，取得他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Randall with Chuck's finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着恰克的手指回去找兰道尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Billy Bogan and retrieve his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死比利·博根。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Randall with Billy's finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着比利的手指回去找兰道尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get Dallas Courtright out of Westside by whatever means necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把达拉斯·考特莱特驱逐出西区。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Randall with news of Dallas' fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着有关达拉斯命运的消息回去找兰道尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look for clues on the Judge's whereabouts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 寻找有关审判官行踪的线索。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Search Javier's corpse for clues about the Judge's whereabouts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在哈维尔的尸体上寻找关于审判官下落的线索。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Search Randall's safe for information on the Judge's whereabouts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在兰道尔的保险箱里搜索关于审判官下落的线索。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Cormac and acquire information on the Judge's whereabouts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀了科马克，获取有关审判官行踪的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find The Judge and deal with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到审判官，解决他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hunter's Toughness
ESP.TRADUIT: 坚韧猎手

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've distinguished yourself as the premiere bounty hunter in the region, and as a result you've acquired a boost to your damage threshold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经成为该地区最出色的赏金猎人，因此你的伤害阈值得到了提升。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've discovered the half-eaten remains of Tomas. It's a grisly scene that turns your stomach; you fear that the other two children have met a similiar fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找到了托马斯被吃得只剩了一半儿的尸体，眼前的场景令你恶心得想吐。你不由得开始担心剩下两个孩子的命运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tomas' Remains
ESP.TRADUIT: 托马斯的残骸

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You scan the blood-stained pages of Quantrill's diary. It's a crude account of countless raids, scavenging missions, and skirmishes that span several decades.
The final log mentions his superior officer, Onoda, and Quantrill's feelings for him. He mentions their intent to assault the Brotherhood of Steel Safehouse, as a means to acquire weaponry.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你浏览着沾着血的匡特里尔日记。上面粗糙地记载这几十年来他所参与的各种抢劫、谋杀与争斗。
最后几行内容提到了他的上级长官，奥诺达，以及夸斯利对他的长官的观点和看法。他还提到，他们接下来准备入侵钢铁兄弟会的避难所，为的是那些高科技武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quantrill's Diary
ESP.TRADUIT: 匡特里尔的日记

ESP.ORIGINAL: You scan the crudely drawn map and notice a location to the west marked as "Shelter".
ESP.TRADUIT: 你浏览着这张粗糙的地图，注意到在西部的某一地点处标注着“藏身处”几个字。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Map
ESP.TRADUIT: 地图
